casebody.data:
Mrs. Elnora HARRIS et al., Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. Dr. H. A. FOSTER et al., Defendants-Appellees. No. 30908. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. May 27, 1971. Howard Moore, Jr., Peter E. Rinds-kopf, Atlanta, Ga., for plaintiffs-appellants. John T. Marshall, Randall L. Hughes, Atlanta, Ga., Willis G. Haugen, Newnan, Ga., James C. Owen, Jr., Griffin, Ga., Sanders, Mottola, Haugen, Wood & Good-son, Newnan, Ga., Beck, Goddard, Owen, Squires & Murray, Griffin, Ga., Attorneys for defendants-appellees.

*985Before GEWIN, BELL and MORGAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1
